item.title: M6 Excel Topics
item.description: Introduction and Assumed Knowledge # Why Excel? # Excel is great to spread data and calculations in a tabular form, and have a visual overview. Most financial modelling is done in Excel (at least initially). In actuarial work, many more advanced codes (in R, Python, C++, C#, VBA, â€¦) often starts with someone playing around in Excel, and once proof of concept is approved, this moves to proper coding.
